thread.title: Great hotel, staff and locaiton
thread.title_full: Great hotel, staff and locaiton - Review of The Renwick Hotel New York City, Curio Collection by Hilton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: michaeldJ3468ZS
title: Great hotel, staff and locaiton
text: Historic hotel updated with modern amenities and a great indy, art theme. Staff quite friendly and helpful. Restaurant had very good food and service for breakfast and dinner - very much equal to NYC standards. Location is perfect for subway access as well as walking.
